page.title: 15AGRICULTURE
page.content: {AGRICULTURE.}In Coggeshall there are many hundreds of acres of good farm land.The main arable crops are cereals,potatoes,peas,sugarbeet and oil seed rape.Some fields are used to grow Pick Your Own Fruits.There are not many grazing animals here now but most farms have pigs and chickens. There are just a few horses,cows and sheep.When the Bypass was being built some fields were disturbed.It cut through two belonging to Monkdown Farm and five belonging to Bouchiers Farm. Raynscroft and Houchins Farms were also affected.The farmers protested but they lost.Coggeshall is a seed growing centre.King's Seeds sell their products to other companies.They have trial fields for developing new strains of seeds.Humphreys and Keys are Garden Centres,where plants, flowers and shrubs are sold.
